授業方法: Lecture. Group work. All fourteen classes will be face-to-face format.

第6回: Review of short answer questions for the first set of five lectures.
第11回: Prepare a a draft version of the report and get feedback from the teacher.
第14回: Review of short answer questions for the second set of five lectures.
トピック.授業外学習2:
The students are required to conduct an interview with someone they know, and then write a short report about that interview. 
After each class, the students are expected to answer about five short questions on the contents of the lecture. These questions are provided via LUNA, and appear on the tests.
